title: Newly Renovated With Amazing Natural Light! Close to Freeway 880!
posting_body: Tucked away amid tree-lined courtyards, Amber Court Apartments is an oasis of serenity and charm, making it the ideal place to call home at the end of a busy day.
Spacious residences feature thoughtfully designed floor plans, modern kitchens, in-home washer and dryers, and private patios and balconies.
Enjoy our community’s refreshing swimming pool, soothing sauna and comprehensive fitness center.
Pet-friendly Amber Court is conveniently located in Fremont with easy access to Highway 880 for destinations in Silicon Valley or north to Oakland and San Francisco.
Want more info on this unit?
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1066 Sq.
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
Pet deposit is $400 and max weight limit is 35 lbs.
There is a $45 cat pet rent $65 dog pet rent.
Please call our leasing center for complete pet policy information.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
